One of the things that always impressed me about Frank and all at Desert Car Care, was his and their deep commitment to the community they serve. Frank is always looking to give back to the local community, quite unusual in today's 'self' culture. Even more impressive is his deep care and passion for building relationships with his customers, his staff and his community. I would highly recommend Frank and Desert Car Care to all in the Phoenix, Chandler and Gilbert areas. Excellent service, excellent customer care.
